title: Lingwood, a chunky slab serif
content:
This is my first attempt at designing a typeface from the ground   
up, any and all comments are appreciated. Be brutal -- I want   
to learn!   
   
I wasn't entirely sure whether to post this here or in the display   
section, since I only really intended it to be used in large sizes.   
A couple of people have told me they like it in smaller sizes, but   
I think it's too heavy. I may make a lighter (and better spaced   
for text) weight if this one turns out OK.   
   
Thanks in advance,   
   
Jordan
